roleset.name: sell at retail
roleset.note: RETAIL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'retail' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entries Commerce and Commerce sell. (from retail.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: typically ergative
example.text: Toshiba Corp. busted open that sector this summer with a notebook-sized machine that *trace* retails for less than 200,000 yen (under $1,500) -- one of the smallest, cheapest PCs available in the country.

example.name: agentive!
example.text: [Golden Feldman Furs Inc.]-1 began *trace*-1 retailing aggressively eight years ago, and now retail sales account for about 20% of gross income.
